name: Stars
text: Inspire 1

name: Dagger
text: Your opponent discards a card.
story:
I have a point now
I am no longer alone, scattered 
But trained wholly on the promise
Of your body, squirming

name: Nascence
text: Birth 1

name: Impulse
text:
Fleeting
Create two Ashes in your discard pile.
story:
Belly burns with knowing now
Burning hand tells me how heroic I am
A whiff of ‘what if?’ is not enough to stop me

name: Dove
text:
Visible
Fleeting
story:
Look at my eyes.
Surrender
To the one thing you want

name: Drown
text: Discard the top three cards of your deck.

name: Dash
text: Worth -1 for each card before this in the story.
story: I look around only to remind me: Move on! Fast!

name: Starling
text:
Visible
Fleeting
Worth +1 if the next card in the story has base cost 1.
story:
Making headway
Defying the headwind
Heading out and through

name: Birth
text: Birth 2

name: Cosmos
text: Inspire 1 for this and each of your cards later in the story.

name: Ancestry
text: Birth 1 for each card later in the story.

name: Fruit
text: Nourish 3

name: Mercy
text: Each player draws a card.

name: Hurricane
text: Set both players' points to 0.

name: Arsonist
text:
Fleeting
Create three Ashes in your discard pile.
story:
We build and tend and feed and joy
Flames dance in the buildings
Crackle in the streets
We still build and tend and feed and joy
And suddenly it's all up in smoke

name: Mine
text: Remove from the game the top four cards of your discard pile.

name: Wing Clipping
text: Your opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their deck.
story:
We walked and ran and played then
You leave me behind
I gasp as the space between us grows

name: Veteran
text: Worth +2 if your discard pile has at least eight cards in it.
story:
The veteran sleepwalks, body aware and functioning
Carrying a longing for the time when they knew
What there was to know

name: Uprising
text: Worth +1 for each card before this in the story.

name: Shadow
text: Costs X, where X is the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
story:
Your pain blooms like flowers on a misty day.
I breathe it in.
Perhaps I can rest now.

name: Cling
text: Worth +X, where X is the highest base cost in your discard pile. Put that card on top of your deck.
story:
Reaching back with the back of the eyes
To that moment when
I see myself – not as I am – but as I was - clearly

name: Death
text: Costs 0 if you have at least twelve cards in your discard pile.
story:
I knew you were coming, I just didn’t know when.
Go easy on me.
I am tired, sated, and looking for new life.

name: The Future
text:
Costs X less, where X is the total point value of all Children in your hand.
Draw a card.

name: Oak
text: If you win this round, Nourish 1 for each point you won by.

name: Dawn
text:
When played, gain Sight 4
Morning: Gain Sight 1

name: Nectar
text:
Nourish 1
When played, gain Sight 3

name: Prey
text: Create a Predator in your opponent's hand.

name: Dew
text: Morning: Create a Dew in your hand.
story:
I return
Over and over again
Swelling the future

name: Night Vision
text:
Draw a card with base cost 2.
When played, gain Sight 3

name: Clear View
text: Create a Seen in your opponent's hand.

name: Rebirth
text:
Fleeting
Transform each of your cards later in the story into a 0:X Fleeting Child, where X is its base cost.

name: Hungry Ghost
text: Nourish -4

name: Sunflower
text: Inspire 1 for each point this is worth.

name: Parch
text:
Worth +1 for each of your cards later in the story. Discard those cards.
When played, your cards cost 0 this round.
story:
We drank and we drank, then
We washed and fed fountains, then
We watered and we swam, then
Now we lick our parched lips

name: Hold Tight
text: Put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Fishing Boat
text: Draw 3 cards that each have base cost 1.

name: Imprison
text: At the end of this round, if your opponent has 3 or fewer points, they Nourish -1
story:
All tied up
can’t even stand
Am I lethal to you and yours
My tight bonds calm me.

name: From Ashes
text: Remove from the game the top three cards of your discard pile. Nourish 1 for each card with Fleeting removed.
story:
Ash carefully tends
The green shoot
Living on atonement
Tender so close to death and beginning

name: Pet
text: This permanently retains all changes to its points.

name: Bounty
text: Both players Nourish 2

name: Cradle
text: Birth 2

name: Nightmare
text: Morning: If you have more cards in hand than your opponent, create a Shadow in hand.
story:
I struggle to find myself
Between the claws and biting words
Shearing my mind away

name: Sickness
text:
Fleeting
Create a Sickness in your opponent's hand, then they Nourish -4

name: Awakening
text: Retain your Sight at the end of this round.

name: Secretary Bird
text:
Visible
Worth +1 for each card in your hand with base cost 0 or 1. Remove those cards from the game.
story:
I will I will I will
Become me become me become me
At your peril

name: Posterity
text: Morning: Birth 1

name: Gentle Rain
text: Nourish 1 for each card you've drawn this round.

name: Iceberg
text:
Draw two cards.
Costs 1 less for each time you’ve passed this round.

name: Heron
text:
Visible
Set both player's points to 0.
Costs 1 more for each card in your discard pile.
story:
How you see me
Is of no importance to me
I am playing with being here, there, every where

name: Conquer
text: Costs 1 less for each card you can see in the story.

name: Phoenix
text:
Visible
Fleeting
Create a Dove in your hand.
story:
Cracks in the shell
Shell falls away
I stretch into wide possibilities

name: Moon
text: Morning: Trigger the morning abilities of the top 2 cards below this with morning.

name: Boa
text: If this is nourished, your opponent discards a card.
story:
I reach I win I have it.
It is all mine now!
Can I make it me?

name: Ecology
text: When played, gain 10 breath.

name: Enlightenment
text: Costs 0 if you can see at least three of your opponent's cards in the story.

name: Excess
text: Costs 0 if you have exactly four cards in the story.

name: Sun
text: Morning: Gain 2 breath.
story:
I raise my head over the horizon
I begin
Just like you

name: Paramountcy
text: Add the top five cards of your discard pile to the story after this.

name: Hollow
text: Set your points to 0. Nourish 1 for each point you lost this way.
